Qq62bKyw.title: Copy Innovation
Qq62bKyw.abstract: Innovation is the most important spirit for an enterprise. A lot of companies are implementing the strategy of innovation. The idea of innovation of each successful enterprise varies, while the core of innovation can be copied and learned. Attending to the innovation mode of successful enterprises, we hope to better boost innovation moving force of medical appliances industry and to enhance innovative capability. As an important factor to medical industry, the development and innovation of medical appliance industry is closely bound up with the medical system of a country.

I01b9P9n.title: Generic Drug Name Prescription:Where is the way?
I01b9P9n.abstract: Prescription Administra- tive Policy taking effect in May 1st this year endows the Ge- neric Drug Name in law.As yet,have all prescription adopted Generic Drug name as the policy makers expect?Have all kinds of drugs followed One Drug Two Regulations?What we see now is some strange symbols or alternative Generic Drug Name Prescription.What we hear is the disaccord from hospital,patients and enterprises.Generic Drug Name Prescription seems of no effects.With various problems facing the policy,can Prescrip- tion Administrative Policy be further carried out?

MvqAulPJ.title: The Silence of Clinical Drug Trial
MvqAulPJ.abstract: Hospital,CROs and companies,there parts of the drug research chain,relate each other very tightly.However,because of the lack of conditionality among them,the development of each part of this chain is restricted

7raVA3qD.title: CNA:In Need of Changes
7raVA3qD.abstract: The emergence of certified nursing assistant, CNA for short, satisfies the need of nursing. While at the meantime, it brings along with it many new problems to the hospital. Despite its supplement to the nursing force, there is a lack in its professional expertise and a chaos in its current management. In order to improve its service quality and provide a guide in the management of CNA by the hospital, the current situation of CNA is in great need of changes.

pdQ6qwbK.title: New Scheme of Medical Device Development
pdQ6qwbK.abstract: In the 60th China International Medical Equipment Fair,more and more domestic and international manufactures exhibited their fire-new products in a way more close to the medical cli nic.They const antly provide creative resolvent of the medical issues which is suitable for the applied circumstance,and provide one-up development idea and creative resolvent to the developing Chinese medical industry.

YWg0ukU2.title: Black List Triggers the Battle of Anti-Corruption
YWg0ukU2.abstract: The Beijing Health Bureau for the first time released the list of 21 enterprises that have bad records in medicine purchase and sale corruption on 26, November. This move gives a heavy blow to the corruption occurred in medicine purchase and sales by public opinion, market access and legal sanction from the very beginning and evokes direct responses within the industry. Although the long effectiveness is the key factor to the measure, it indicates the government redoubles its effort to cope with the business corruption in medicine purchase and sale area.

x1ayk0d8.title: Antiattack war of antibiotics
x1ayk0d8.abstract: Now,the death toll are from 8 to 10 million people every year in China due to antibiotic adverse reactions When we have become accustomed to using antibiotics to resolve the majority of infections,regardless of their cause of bacterial resistance consequences of the time,no one to think about the future ,one day when bacterial resistance reach a limit at what it means. In the use of national health and public health security for antibiotics huge economic interests of the war,we lose,and we steadily retreat.This is a war which is lack of commander in chief.However, not devoid of hope.

b1QSZrQp.title: Total Solution
b1QSZrQp.abstract: On the medical expo (fall) in Chengdu Province from 24th to 27th, November in 2007, purchase displays claiming total solution caught great attention and medical instrument purchase missions came in succession. Total solution energetically promoted by many enterprises aimed to provide better service for medical organizations. The enterprises tailored a set of products to the customers’ need, ranging from hospital system consultancy. The all-round service from the enterprise coincides with the needs of the hospital.

qZLikiTL.title: Time of No Problem with Swiping Card
qZLikiTL.abstract: The problem occurred in the application of POS in hos- pital makes us to continually think about whether patients- oriented service idea is followed or not.The hospital is expected to offer popular domestic and international credit card service to bring convenience to patients the best possible.

fZWc6T7H.title: The Loss of Drugs Produced by Appointed Drug Manufactures
fZWc6T7H.abstract: Having gone through the twists and turns for a year,the first patch of drugs which are produced by appointed drug manufactures and intended for the use in communities in cities and rural areas came on into the market.Dark waves hidden in the market,however are surging greatly.The approaches the visible hands adopted to avoid monopoly in market economy are in fact the questions for the policy- makers.

UiV92I7M.title: Ongoing Appliances Reclaim
UiV92I7M.abstract: On the eve of official publication Management of reclaiming medical appliances, attention has been given to this field not well familiar to people. Many medical appliances manufacturing enterprises take precautions to study the effects of the regulations to their operation, some hospitals start strengthening statistic work and analysis of adverse reaction of medical appliances; meanwhile they prepare to reclaim some deficit production. The masses are looking forward to its publication so as to use safe and accurate medical appliances thus safeguarding the dignity of life and health.

k9Nvqvrp.title: Beijing: Start from Community
k9Nvqvrp.abstract: Medical reform is general trends in China, which has attracted so many attentions of public. In recent years, different provinces and cities all over our countries have various opinions and take various actions of medical reform, while they hardly form an integral medical reform mode. However. Beijing makes breakthroughs. It is wise that Beijing starts its integral medical reform from community health service by streamline displaced medical system and thus made the current system more smoothly, also by community health service, Beijing finally shows a panorama of medical reform. In this issue, let us see why Beijing starts medical reform from community.

vXf0rZiI.title: Centralized Purchasing of Medical Disposable Materials Starts Off
vXf0rZiI.abstract: In the middle of March,the Guangdong medication purchase service centre had announced to the public that,Guangdong will start a new sunshine purchasing mode of medical disposable materials which is organized by government and in the unit of province.The city and town will not organize the related work afterward.

Nq9Kdj6y.title: New Health-care Reform:"Establish Constitutional Rule"
Nq9Kdj6y.abstract: Aa a blueprint and creed of the new health-care reform,the New Health-care Reform Plan and its emphasis were publicated in April.After three years' gestation,the local test of the plan will be the big issue of health industry in the coming years.

M8CL63QU.title: Achieve the Three-year Goal of New Healthcare Reform in Advance
M8CL63QU.abstract: The director of Ningbo Municipal Health Bureau says,if the goal of new Healthcare Reform could be achieved in thtee years,we can now see its rudiment in Ningbo.Before the publication of new Healthcare Reform Plan,Ningbo have partly realized the important goals of the plan,and even in some fields,its accomplishment has gone beyond the goal setted by the new Healthcare Reform Plan

R19hDQwx.title: Blood in Short Supply
R19hDQwx.abstract: The blood station is face with severe competition of high cost. Thus the use of limited funds to meet the quality safety standards and the improvement of comprehensive use of plasma needs to be settled quickly for the enterprises of blood products. The short supply of plasma as source material gives rise to the short supply of blood products. As a matter of fact, what behind all the problems is the management predicament and technical crisis of the whole blood products industry.

rUsrhlAx.title: Antibiotics:Hard to Back to Its Place
rUsrhlAx.abstract: Without any doubt,the antibiotics manufacturing en-terprises are affected by a se-ries of policies the Government have made to standardize the medicine use and reduce the cost of medical charges. When the hospital and enterprises are busy seeking for the answers,we may as well give serious consideration to the reasonable use of medicine which believed to be decisive to the medicine production. The balance be-tween reasonable use and rea-sonable production is an issue the hospital and medical indus-try have to tackle toge.

gmTji7a1.title: Basic Medicine System:"From Country to City"
gmTji7a1.abstract: How to make a price of medicine in the same general name,how to setup the percent of the basic medicine use in medical institutions,and how to make the medical institutios accept Basic Medicine Clinic Application Guide,are three big issues after the publication of Basic Medicine Catalogue.

2XtfSpZd.title: Pharmaceutical P0licy Reform in Ningbo
2XtfSpZd.abstract: The two reform p0licies about pharmaceutical circulation institution--pharmaceutical bidding and cheap medicine institution--was once a couple of comrade in arms,fighting together for lowering the medicine cost of Ningbo's people. However,after no more than two years,they are now standing in two different worlds.

kvxhKAik.title: New Rural Cooperation Medical System Bring Business opportunity to Medical Investment
kvxhKAik.abstract: Amid the global economic crisis,the investors are busy in seeking new business opportunities at the same time when they are shrinking the investment.And some investor found that,when ecnomic woes,the health industry could be relatively stable.In China,the health industry is particularly attractive for investors under a background when China is prompting new rural cooperation medical system.

nDKRqny9.title: Hu Jinhong: Supply Medicine to the Clinic through the Third Party
nDKRqny9.abstract: In nowadays, the new pharmaceutical business is much more complex than before, referring to several taches. As a manager of a hospital pharmacy, Hu Jinhong had understood that, to strengthen the modern pharmacy through the social power is indispensable.

9G7WG20d.title: New GMP Pluge in a Seesaw Battle
9G7WG20d.abstract: The new GMP authentication is not only a rebuilding of the software and hardware for medical companies,but also a integrated upgradimg for the industry itself.

OFM6YIpU.title: Five Needs and Seven Trends of Automated Device in the Hospital Clinic Pharmacy
OFM6YIpU.abstract: Some errors of manual drug distribution are endangering the profit of hospital and patients,while the automatization system of clinic pharmacy could effectively resolve the problems of drug management,help improving the drug management and reducing accidents.

L1rb2e06.title: The Glory and the Dream of Pharmocoeconomics
L1rb2e06.abstract: The value of pharmocoeconomics is recognized abroad because it can meet the need of public health. Since 1993, pharmocoeconomics was introduced to China, however, to a large extent, it was only limited to theory, losing its glory.

C4tWfGaf.title: New GMP Authentication
C4tWfGaf.abstract: A new GMP Authentication is heatedly underway now. The original purpose of the policy maker is to enhance the overall quality of medical industry and eliminate some unqualified enterprises. It indeed made progress in hardware aspect, while the successive accidents of drug safety throw doubt on its function. The news of new GMP Authentication cause widespread concern among those in medical industry. What's the difference between the old and the new one? What kind of influence or changes it will bring to the enterprise?

QYfHfICb.title: How to meet the opportunity of the new-type rural CMS?
QYfHfICb.abstract: Hospital how to seize opportunities to accelerate development?From the ideal point of view, policies and hospital development should promote each other. However, this process exists a fatal trap -appointed hospitals may cause and strengthen the non- standard medical practice. But this just brings short- term interests, the effective approach is to cooperate with the major hospitals and the building of its own hospital culture.

n0f4MP7X.title: Study on the growth performance of Yunnan local chicken species and local-crossing chicken species
n0f4MP7X.abstract: Study on the growth performance of three local chicken species and one local-crossing chicken species,The result showed that the growth velocity and meat performance of localcrossing chicken species is apparently higher than that of the local chicken species.There is no significant deviation in very index between Yanjin black-bone chicken and Wuding chicken,the Chahua chicken's growth velocity is the slowest.Because the different chicken have different market price,the benefit of local chicken species is better than that of local-crossing chicken species by analysis.Compared comprehensively,the economy benefit of Chahua chicken is the highest,the next in order is Wuding chicken,Yanjin black-bone chicken,local-crossing chicken is minimal.Another,the growth velocity of these local chicken species has been increased through being fed compound feed and fed in house.
n0f4MP7X.venue: Southwest China Journal of Agricultural Sciences

O0YkLiRL.title: Effect of Protein Level on Slaughter Index of Beef Cattle
O0YkLiRL.abstract: 【Objective】 For the purpose of different protein level effect on beef cattle slaughter index.【Method】 Five levels of protein feed stuff were designed and fed 5 groups of beef cattle and compared with no protein group as control.【Result】The beef carcass fat and eye muscle erea were larger when fed higher protein level,and which improved the carcass quality and carcass measure index.The protein level influenced the weight of organs mainly on head,skin,liver,kidney,gallbladder,bladder and diaphragm.There was no regular effect on the weight of digestion system,heart,lung,spleen.【Conclusion】The increase of beef cattle slaughter index could be achieved by the way of complement protein.

end9cpNk.title: Comparative research on the flavor quality of meat in Yunnan native chicken
end9cpNk.abstract: There were a lot of meat quality evaluation indices,of which tenderness,muscles fiber diameter,water content,protein,fat of muscles,pH and water holding capacity of meat were important indices that were usually used to evaluate meat quality.The meat quality of 3 Yunnan native chicken(Chahua chicken,Yanjin black-bone chicken,Wuding chicken) and Guangxi miscellaneous broilers were studied.The results showed that muscles fiber diameter,tenderness and water holding capacity of 3 Yunnan local chickens were better than Guangxi miscellaneous broilers,but there was no significant difference for pH.Chahua chicken and Wuding chicken were almost the same for crude protein,crude fat and crude ash,but higher than other chicken.Above all,3 Yunnan chicken was better than Guangxi miscellaneous broilers for meat quality,but the best was Chahua chicken.

Rk3bp2dq.title: Analysis of Crossing Effects for Yunnan Yellow Cattle
Rk3bp2dq.abstract: 【Objective】In order to improve the production performance of Yunnan cattle,the screening on crossbreeding and improvement paternal were carried by the imported breeds crossbreeding of Yunnan cattle in Yunnan.【Method】 Yunnan female cattle was mated with the imported Simmental,Shorthorn,Angus and Hereford of quality beef breeds from abroad,and the body weight and size of hybrids at newborn,6 months 12 months and 24 months old were measured.【Result】The adaptability of crossbreeding offspring(F1) were very well.The results showed that the body weight of F1 crossbreds of yunnan cattle with Simmental or Shorthorn or Angus or Hereford at birth was 24.57 kg,22.28 kg,21.21 kg and 22.87 kg;at 6 month-old was 135.83 kg,117.20 kg,134.34 kg and 124.97 kg;at 12 month-old was 196.21 kg,193.56 kg,196.18 kg and 190.52 kg;at 24 month-old was 344.24 kg,314.86 kg,268.45 kg and 289.50 kg;The body weight of yunnan cattle at birth was 14.11 kg;at 6 month-old was 85.32 kg;at 12 month-old was 125.35 kg;at 24 month-old was 193.28 kg.【Conclusion】The production performance of crossbreeding offspring and the improvement effect were significant.

vA7UZSUV.title: Genetic Diversity of Gayal by Microsatellite DNA Marker
vA7UZSUV.abstract: Genetic diversity of gayal conservation region of mountain Fenghuang in county Lushui and gayal protection base in county Gongshan in Yunnan province was evaluated with 26 microsatellite loci of cattle,the genetic variability within population and genetic differentiation between populations were investigated.A total of 105 alleles were found,the numbers of alleles per locus were from 2 to 6,the average allele number,effective allele number,expected heterozygosity and polymorphism information content for the population sampled were 4.038 5±0.999 9,3.139 3±0.950 7,0.649 0±0.124 6 and 0.590 4±0.133 4,respectively,all of which revealed that the genetic diversity in the population of gayal was high.The result of F-statistics,gene flow,Nei' s genetic distance and genetic identity indicated that genetic difference was ralatively small and genetic differentiation was low,with high genetic identity between two populations.

1PE7rGrG.title: Economical Benefit Analyses and Quality Evaluation of Sweet Potato Ground Silage
1PE7rGrG.abstract: For the purpose of keeping and reserving the succulence of fresh sweet potato,the rape,rice and wheat bran were mixed with sweet potato.The result showed that there was significant difference(P<0.01) in content of DM,CP,EE and ashes between ground silage of sweet potato vines and fresh sweet potato vines: The proportion of DM in ground silage was higher than that of DM in green vines,and the content of CP and EE in vine silage was ten times of that in green vines respectively.In term of nutritional value,ground silage was generally evaluated to be superior to green vines.However,the difference of these indexes in silage products of sweet potato vines,which made from mixtures of green vines and three types of sorbents(grape residues,rice brans and wheat brans) was not so significant.Fed on ground silage of sweet potato vines,pigs got body gain 100 grams higher than control group per day,which indicated that animals could be sold ten days earlier by utilizing ground silage,and the cost of feeding ground silage was 3.10 RMB,which was lower than control group(3.62 RMB).

egfcU1W0.title: Research on Minimum Approach Distance for Live Working on 1000kV AC Transmission Line
egfcU1W0.abstract: Based on the practice of the 1000kV AC transmission line project, experimental investigations of approach distance for live working on different working positions on 1000kV AC transmission line were carried out. The research on minimum approach distance for live working on UHV (Ultra High Voltage) transmission line was based on the practice of Jindongnan Nanyang Jingmen (Jin-Nan-Jing) pilot project. The results indicate that it is safety and feasible to develop live working on 1000kV AC transmission line in China. In this paper, Switching Overvoltage level and correspding probability density of live working on the first AC UHV transmission line in China were analized; the calclution and correction method of live working risk was discussed; and the switching impulse discharge performances of live working electric structure on outer phase, middle phase and tension string on 1000kV AC transmission line were studied. Based on the results, by calculation and analysis of the risk, the minimum approach distance for live working was determined. The results of this experimental investigation provide technical support and are available for reference to perform live working on 1000kV AC transmission line.

MscXWhw9.title: Research on Portable Protective Gaps for Live Working on 1000kV AC Transmission Line
MscXWhw9.abstract: This paper is intended for research on portable protective gaps for live working on 1000kV AC transmission line. In this paper, design principle of portable protective gaps for live working on 1000kV AC line was determined; Electrode structure of portable protective gaps for live working on 1000kV AC line was provided; Power frequency breakdown test, power frequency withstand voltage test and switching impulse flashover test of portable protective gaps for live working on 1000kV AC line had been performed, and the maximum portable protective gaps correlated to different altitude elevation were calculated according to the test results; Various actual work conditions are simulated in 1:1 tower window, and switching impulse discharge test concerning insulation matching between portable protective gaps and working gap is carried out by means of fluctuation method, additionally risk of live working with portable protective gaps on 1000kV AC line is calculated. Finally it is proved that live working with portable protective gaps not only improves the safety of the working but also decreases the size of tower. So it is essential that research on live working method with portable protective gaps on 1000kV AC transmission line be carried out and corresponding operation instructions be drawn up. Additionally the research results can provide experiences for live working on 1000kV optimized designed lines, compact lines, and multi-circuit on one tower lines to be constructed in China.

4fOsgwEl.title: Experimental Analysis on Degradation of Pentachiorophenol(PCP) by Bipolar Pulsed Discharge in Water
4fOsgwEl.abstract: Bipolar pulsed discharge is an effective method of water treatment. Degradation of the Pentachiorophenol by bipolar pulsed discharge in Glass-sphere/Water/Air Columns was investigated and the active species formed during discharge process was tested. Experimental results show that PCP can be quickly degraded during the bipolar pulsed discharge process. Almost all the PCP can be converted into other intermediates after 6 min discharge treatment,while all the benzene rings are broken for a 60 min treatment. Hydrogen peroxide and ozone can be formed during the discharge process,which is zero-ordered reaction. Rate constant k increases with the applied voltage and the gas flow rate.

rigxncPo.title: Research of minimum approach distance for live working on 750 kV AC transmission lines
rigxncPo.abstract: 750 kV AC transmission lines are the highest voltage class transmission lines now in service in China. To provide technical parameters and ensure the safety for the live working on 750 kV AC transmission lines, the minimum approach distance was researched. According to the conditions of 750 kV AC pilot transmission line from Guantin to Lanzhoudong which was called Guan-Lan line and the line from Lanzhou to Guanzhong via Pingliang which was called Lan-Pin-Guan line, such as the tower types, the line parameters, the power flows, and the equipments configurations etc., by calculating and analyzing, the switching over-voltage level of the lines was determined. By experiments on 1:1 ratio model tower, the switching impulse flashover characteristics of different typical live working positions on outer phase, middle phase and tension string of 750 kV AC transmission lines were obtained, and then corresponding altitude correction was done because the line locates in high altitude area. Correspondingly, the risk rate of live working was calculated and analyzed, and the minimum approach distance for live working on 750 kV AC transmission line was researched and determined. The results of this experimental investigation provide technical support and reference for live working on 750 kV AC transmission line.

Q5RaAVyO.title: Research of Live Working on 750 kV Double Circuit AC Transmission Line
Q5RaAVyO.abstract: In order to determine the safety distance,complex gap and working mode etc.for live working on 750 kV double circuit AC transmission line,based on the practice of Lanzhoudong-Pingliang-Qianxian project,the discharge characteristic curves of different working point were gotten through simulation test,and the induced voltage and earth wire current of dead line were gotten through simulation calculation.Based on the results of test and calculation,the safety distance of equal potential and earth potential,and complex gap of entering equal potential on 750 kV double circuit AC transmission line at different altitudes were determined,including the altitudes of 0～1000 m,1000～2000 m and 2000～2800 m.Meanwhile,the working mode of live working on dead line was also proposed,which could be chosen from equal potential working mode and earth potential working mode by the grounding situation of dead line.The research results can provide a technical support for live working on 750 kV double circuit AC transmission line.

I3GcET7C.title: Experimental research of live working on 1000 kV double circuit AC transmission line on the same tower
I3GcET7C.abstract: In order to coordinate with the construction of the 1000 kV AC double circuit transmission line on the same tower, and to improve the safety and feasibility in live working on transmission line, according to the practice of the tower model, conductors arrangements, live working position in the 1000 kV AC Transmission Demonstration Project of East China, live line work for the line is researched. The safety distance and complex gap of typical locations in live working position were tested at 1:1 ratio scale simulated tower. Meanwhile, the electric field distribution in the space near the line and towers was simulated by the methods of FEM, and the electric field intensity on human-body surface at earth working and potential working two operations were measured through simulated tower. Based on the results of the test and calculation, the minimum safety distance and complex gap of different typical working positions in live working were determined; the distribution of the electric field was summarized and the appropriate protective measures were established. The research result proved the safety and feasibility of live working on 1000 kV double circuit AC transmission line on the same tower.

hdCtwLU3.title: Research on Live Working Complex Gap for 1000kV AC Transmission Lines
hdCtwLU3.abstract: 1000kV AC transmission lines are the latest and highest voltage grade transmission lines in China. To ensure the safety of living working on 1000kV AC transmission lines,the live working complex gap should be researched. According to the practical conditions of Jindongnan-Nanyang-Jinmen 1000kV ACUHV pilot project,the over-voltage level while live working was calculated and analyzed,and then the switching impulse flashover characteristics of complex gaps on side phase,middle phase and tension string of 1000kV transmission lines were obtained by experiments. Based on these,the risk rate of live working was calculated and analyzed,and then live working complex gap of 1000kV AC transmission lines was determined.

t4KHNLRM.title: Formation of Hydrogen Peroxide by Bipolar Pulsed Discharge Plasma in Water
t4KHNLRM.abstract: The active species generated in the plasma reactor play a very important role in the process of water treatment by discharge plasma.Bipolar pulsed discharge in the gas-liquid-solid mixture was studied using a packed bed plasma reactor with gas bubbling in the experiment.Concentrations of H2O2 generated in the bipolar pulsed discharge system were measured,and the effect of different experiment conditions on H2O2 concentration was investigated.Experimental results proved that parameters such as the discharge time,applied voltage,gas flow rate and single pulse energy was positively correlated with the generation of H2O2.Characteristics of the solid packing had great influence on H2O2 concentration.Increase the density of summits on the solid surface increased the H2O2 formed.Compared with other four glass bead diameters between 5 mm and 9 mm,9 mm shows better performance.Besides,bipolar pulsed discharge in the packed bed reactor had a better performance on H2O2 generation than unipolar pulsed discharge.

yuZXoDT7.title: Research on Live Working Complex Gap for 1 000 kV AC Transmission Lines
yuZXoDT7.abstract: According to the practical conditions of Jindongnan-Nanyang-Jinmen 1 000 kV AC ultra high voltage pilot project, the overvoltage level in case of live working is researched by calculation and analysis. The switching impulse flashover characteristics of complex gaps on side phase, middle phase and tension string of 1 000 kV transmission lines are obtained by experiments. Then the risk rate of live working is calculated and analyzed. The minimum live working complex gap of 1 000 kV AC transmission lines is determined.

g46j9WxJ.title: Research of safety protection for live working on 1000 kV ultra high voltage transmission line
g46j9WxJ.abstract: To ensure the safety of live working on 1000 kV transmission lines, safety protection is researched in this paper. Because of the high voltage and strong space electrical field intensity of the 1000 kV Ultra High Voltage transmission lines, it is very important and necessary to do research on the safety protection for live working on 750 kV transmission lines. In this paper, according to the practical conditions of the lines, suitable full set screening clothes were developed, and then characteristics of material that the screening clothes made of and the ready-to-wear were tested following corresponding national standards of GB 6568. 1-2000 and GB 6568. 2-2000. In response to the line condition, measuring of electrical field intensity in and outside of screening clothes at different part of body while climbing tower and during equal-potential process, and arc test and impulse current measuring while during equal-potential process are also taken. The tests' results indicated that the screening clothes developed had good performances on electrical field screening, current splitting and voltage sharing, thus met the requirements for the safety protection of human body while live working on 750 kV transmission lines. Based on the research work, conclusions can be drawn that to ensure the safety of live working, persons doing live working should wear full set screening clothes and use potential rod during equal-potential process.

qsTmCKDE.title: Research on Live Working Inspection of Poor Insulators on ±500kV DC Transmission Line
qsTmCKDE.abstract: The live working inspection device of poor insulators on DC transmission line was developed, and the distributed voltage along insulators on ±500kV DC transmission line was inspected. The results show that the potential distribution of insulator string on DC transmission line is the same with on AC transmission line, which is with U distribution, and affected more with the performances of single insulator. The inspection device can meet the requirements of live working inspection under ±500kV DC transmission line. The research has the important meaning for reducing the outage duration of DC transmission line and improving safe and stable operation of power grid.

VkcqQcln.title: Measurement of Electric Field Intensity on Human-body Surface at Live Working for 1000kV AC Transmission Line
VkcqQcln.abstract: China is going to build UHV high voltage transmission as the core of network architecture. In order to ensure the safety of the live working and the facility of running and operation under the 1000 AC, It's very important to analyze the impact of a strong electric field on live working workers and the protective measures .It is the first time in the domestic to systemic measure the electric field intensity on human-body surface through 1:1 ratio scale simulated tower at earth working and potential working two operations for 1000kV AC transmission line, and the surface field distribution of live working person have been acquired. The results show that the surface electric field of the earth worker's head, hand-sharp and toe-sharp is about 2000kV/m. The climbing worker should dress in the full set screening clothing, and the potential worker must wear screening helmet besides full set screening clothing at live working for 1000kV AC transmission line. When wearing screening helmet, The maximum electric field intensity of live working people's face is 137kV/m, which is lower than the human perception of AC electric field. The results can give a technology support to the safety running and operation of the living work of 1000kV AC transmission line.

y4JqyGSV.title: Experimental Investigation on Live Working for 1000 kV AC Transmission Line
y4JqyGSV.abstract: It is the first time in China to conduct experimental investigation on live working on 1000kV AC transmission line.On the basis of calculation and analysis on over-voltage level of 1000 kV UHVAC transmission line,by means of experiments the least safe working distance and the minimum combination gap under different over-voltage factors are decided;the least effective insulation lengths of insulation tools are decided;the screening clothes that can satisfy the safety requirement of live working on 1000kV transmission line are developed;the safe guarding experiments are conducted,and the safe guarding measures for human body under different working modes are proposed.Above-mentioned research results are available for reference to engineering project of 1000 kV transmission line and live working on it.

PCgRRWyV.title: Properties of Biological Edible Membrane and Its Effect on the Postharvest Storage of Gala Apples
PCgRRWyV.abstract: The biological edible membrane is made by sodium alginate,Cryptococcus laurentii and other edible materials.Its properties,such as thickness,mechanical strength,water vapor transmission,oxygen permeability were studied.Then Gala apples dipped with the biological edible coating liquid.The result showed that the coating significantly decreased the weight loss,enhanced the fresh color of the apples,delayed the decline of hardness and vitamin C and the increased of malondialdehyde.The treated apples also maintained relatively high soluble solids,total sugar and titratable acidity.Further more,it inhibited the growing of Streptomyces and improved the sensory evaluation.Its preservative effect was obviously superior to the control group.Therefore,the study indicates that the biological edible sodium alginate coating containing Cryptococcus laurentii can improve the quality of postharvest storage of Gala apples.

WzYa4cdf.title: Effect of biological membrane on fresh-keeping of strawberry
WzYa4cdf.abstract: Using Cryptococcus laurentii as an antagonist and sodium alginate film for control of the gray mould disease of post-harvest strawberries. Fresh Toyonoka strawberries were used as material. Effect on strawberry fresh-keeping was estimated by the rot rate,weight-lose-ratio,hardness,malondialdehyde(MDA),anthcyanin,and polyphenoloxidase(PPO). The results indicated that the treatment of sodium alginate film entrapped Cryptococcus laurentii could reduce rot rate,decrease weight-lose-ratio,maintain the hardness of strawberry fruit,slowdown increasing of anthcyanin,block increasing of the PPO,and improve the quality and storage property of the fruit. Therefore,the fresh-keeping effect of biological membrane was the best.

HEbLNNkt.title: Removal of Cd~(2+) from Aqueous Solution by Zygosaccharomyces rouxii
HEbLNNkt.abstract: Using lyophilized yeast biomass from Zygosaccharomyces rouxii CICC1379 as biosorbent to evaluate its removal Cd 2+ capabilities from aqueous solution.Results indicated that both temperature and rotary speed affected the removal rate but not significantly whereas the initial pH and yeast dosage strongly affected the Cd 2+ removal rate.When the initial pH value increased from 3-5,the removal rate of both two groups increased correspondingly.pH 5-7 was the suitable pH for Cd 2+ removal.Biosorption kinetic studies suggested that the most of Cd 2+ was removed from the solution in the first 5 min and the biosorption equilibrium was attained within 30 min when the yeast were treated with the content of Cd 2+ solution 10.22 mg/L and 53.39 mg/L,respectively.

3X7YUeHx.title: Adsorption behavior of citric acid on resin of chitosan microspheres
3X7YUeHx.abstract: The resin of chitosan microspheres (RCM) was prepared by using reverse phase suspension cross-linking polymerization. Static adsorption experiments were carried out to study the adsorption kinetics and thermodynamics of citric acid on RCM. The results indicated that the adsorption of citric acid followed the Langmuir isotherm. The Langmuir equilibrium constant (Kb) increased with increasing temperature. The adsorption was a non-spontaneous endothermic process of entropy increasing in thermodynamics of adsorption. The adsorption potential decreased gradually as citric acid concentration increased at the same temperature, and it increased as temperature increased at the same initial concentration of citric acid. The saturated adsorption capacities of citric acid on RCM were 77.0, 80.5 and 84.7 mg/g at 298, 308 and 318 K. The adsorption followed a second-order kinetic equation. The adsorption rate was controlled by the intraparticle diffusion, and the intraparticle diffusion rate constant (K) increased with increasing temperature.

8IktBQa5.title: Fermentation of the mixture of oyster enzymatic hydrolysate and radish juice by lactic acid bacteria
8IktBQa5.abstract: A strain of lactic acid bacteria was screened from kimchi and identified as Lactobacillus sp..The vegetable juice was fermented by the Lac-tobacillus sp.and the fermentation conditions were optimized as follows: the ratio of carrot juice to bean sprout juice 1∶5,temperature 35℃ and initial pH 7.0.Using oyster enzymatic hydrolysate and radish juice as fermentation substrates,Lactobacillus sp.21 was inoculated and fermented anaerobi-cally.The optimal fermentation conditions were obtained by the orthogonal experiment as follows: temperature 28℃,inoculation 5% and fermenta-tion time 16 h.Under these conditions,the number of viable cell reached 9.5×108/ml.The results can provide a new method of using oyster and radish with high value.

tgWEQB6E.title: The Breeding of Mutant strains of Zygosaccharomyces rouxii for High Cadmium Resistance and Biosorption Capability
tgWEQB6E.abstract: The present study focuses on the improvement of cadmium resistance and biosorption capability in Zygosaccharomyces rouxii utilizing mutagenesis technology.The cadmium resistance level of Z.rouxii is measured by the method of minimum inhibitory concentration(MIC).Using cadmium-containing YEPD petri dishes,three preferred mutants of Z.rouxii CICC1379 were screened out,namely,Cd102,Cd103,Cd104.The cadmium resistance level of these mutants is 26mg/L,10mg/L,14mg/L,respectively,noticeably greater than that of the parent strain(6mg/L).The cadmium resistance level of mutant strain Cd102 has a high genetic stability,and its biosorption capability has also improved correspondingly.The removal efficiency of mutant strain Cd102 for 0.775,3.205,6.843 and 36.335mg/L Cd2+ solutions is 76.47%,69.99%,64.01% and 51.79%,respectively,which has increased by 7.01%,12.85%,15.3% and 8.65% compared with the parent strain.Furthermore,it apparently shows a better ability of biosorption for cadmium solution of median and low concentration.Cd102 is considered a powerful strain for Cd removal studies from food and water environment in the future.

ScVZpBEq.title: Study on the edible composite films of gellan gum and agar
ScVZpBEq.abstract: The gellan and agar were used as raw materials to prepare a new edible composite film through the method of blending.The optimal formula was determined through single factor and response surface analysis with index of tensile strength and water vapor transmission ratio.The result showed that the optimal formula was gellan content 1.69%,agar content 2.60%,the ratio of gellan in the blending solution 55.25%,glycerol content 0.24% on the drying temperature of 55℃.The prepared edible film had tensile strength of 72.09MPa and water vapor transmission ratio of 0.58×10-10g/Pa·s·m2.This suggestd that the composite film was a very promising film for internal packaging in food industry with safe,environmental friendly,and biodegradable properties.

zNqrPQUQ.title: Effects of premature yeast flocculation polysaccharide in malt on beer fermentation
zNqrPQUQ.abstract: The effects of PYF polysaccharide in malt on beer fermentation were studied.The fermentation degree,alcohol content,the content of flavor compounds and organic acid in beer fermentation liquid were determined.Results showed that the quantity of suspended yeast cells decreased significantly,the fermentation degree and alcohol content decreased,the content of diacetyl and acetaldehyde increased,the content of higher alcohols,esters,DMS and organic acids decreased.

wdqOoTba.title: Effect of sodium alginate coating and ~(60)Co-γ irradiation treatment on fresh-keeping of golden silk jujube
wdqOoTba.abstract: Using golden silk jujube at full-red storage as materials,the effects of different preservation treatments(60Co-γ irradiation,coating with sodium alginate,and 60Co-γ irradiation+coating with sodium alginate,respectively) on the post-harvest fruit quality during cold storage were investigated,and the weight loss rate,total sugar content,reducing sugar content,VC content,and ratio of sugar to acid were determined.The results indicated that 60Co-γ irradiation,coating with sodium alginate and 60Co-γ irradiation+coating with sodium alginate all had an obvious fresh-keeping effect.The result showed that the three treatments reduced water loss,delayed the decrease of VC and titratable acid content,and the increase of sugar to acid ratio,and 60Co-γ irradiation+coating with sodium alginate maintained a relatively high content of total sugar and reducing sugar.Especially,the preservative effect of the 60Co-γ irradiation+coating with sodium alginate treatment was obviously superior to the control group,60Co-γ irradiation or coating with sodium alginate alone,which could obviously improve the quality of post-harvest cold storage of golden silk jujube.

XLCB4F7g.title: Optimization of the enzymatic hydrolysis of oyster with protease M via response surface method
XLCB4F7g.abstract: The effects of five types of protease on the enzymatic hydrolysis of oyster were studied. Protease M was chosen to improve the amino acid conversion of oyster enzyme solution finally. On the base of the single factors experiments, three important influencing factors of enzymatic hydrolysis were optimized by Response Surface Method. The optimum conditions were 50 ℃ of temperature, 263 min of the total reaction and 0.80% of the enzyme dosage. Our results showed that the content of free amino acid N was 0.871 g/100 g and the amino acid conversion was 53.62% under the above mentioned conditions.

J3yhPtbC.title: Progress on phenolic compounds in food and interaction with other components
J3yhPtbC.abstract: Phenolic compounds are important secondary metabolites in plant,which have wide distribution in plant-source food.Because of its excellent oxidation resistance,protecting color,add flavor and health care function,phenolic is important functional components in food and common food additives.Interaction between phenolic compounds and other ingredients such as proteins,lipids,carbohydrate,metal ions,vitamins etc.in foods are reviewed,in order to provide reference for applications of phenolic components.

YM8FoKbE.title: Different effects of sodium chloride preincubation on cadmium tolerance of Pichia kudriavzevii and Saccharomyces cerevisiae.
YM8FoKbE.abstract: Application of growing microorganisms for cadmium removal is restricted by high cadmium toxicity. The effects of sodium chloride (NaCl) preincubation on the cadmium tolerance and removal ability of Pichia kudriavzevii and Saccharomyces cerevisiae were investigated in this study. NaCl preincubation improved the biomass of P. kudriavzevii under cadmium stress, while no obvious effect was observed in S. cerevisiae. The improved activities of peroxidase (POD) and catalase (CAT) after NaCl preincubation might be an important reason for the decrease of the reactive oxygen species (ROS) accumulation, cell death, and oxidative damage of proteins and lipids induced by cadmium, contributing to the improvement of the yeast growth. The cadmium bioaccumulation capacity of P. kudriavzevii decreased significantly after NaCl preincubation, which played an important role in mitigating the cadmium toxicity to the yeast. The cadmium removal rate of P. kudriavzevii was obviously higher than S. cerevisiae and was significantly enhanced after NaCl preincubation. The results suggested that NaCl preincubation improved the cadmium tolerance and removal ability of P. kudriavzevii.

GW1WhcVs.title: Effects of metal ions in tea polysaccharides on their in vitro antioxidant activity and hypoglycemic activity.
GW1WhcVs.abstract: Total tea polysaccharides (TTPS) were extracted from two kinds of pruning leaves of tea plant and fractionated into neutral tea polysaccharides (TPSI) and acidic tea polysaccharides (TPSII) by anion exchange resin D315. Some physicochemical properties, including structure, monosaccharide composition, and molecular weight distribution, as well as the 4 in vitro antioxidant activities and inhibitory effects on α-glucosidase of above polysaccharides before and after removing metal ions were investigated. By comparing TTPS and TPSII, we found that they exhibited different antioxidant activities and inhibitory actions against α-glucosidase after their metal ions were removed. However, the in vitro antioxidant activities and inhibitory effects on α-glucosidase of TPSI were substantially improved. The study can be a certain reference for tea and soil selection. At the same time, we suggested that pruning leaves of tea plant could be treated as a potential resource for the development of polysaccharide antioxidants and hypoglycemic products.

SfOr9XA4.title: Effect of Lactobacillus plantarum Fermentation on Oyster Sauce
SfOr9XA4.abstract: Effect of Lactobacillus plantarum on the chemical components during fermentation process was studied based on homogenized oyster sauce by adding NaCI and inoculation of Lactobacillus plantarum culture.The results showed that addition of 4% NaCl inhibited total volatile basic nitrogen(TVBN)value.The pH value of the tested group by inoculation of LactobaciUus plantarum culture decreased very fast after 2 d fermentation and pH was about 4.0 till the end,which effectively inhibited the increase in TVBN value.Soluble protein of oyster was decomposed by oyster autolytic enzymes and microorganisms for growth and enzymatic hydrolysis.The intermediate product and amino acid concentration increased along the fermentation course.However,the curve of soluble protein concentra- tion was waved.Deoxidized sugar was comumed gradually and 0.07 mg/ml was detected after 10 d cultivation. Lactobacillus plantarum played an important roles in oyster sauce formation.These data and conclusion would be useful in further oyster processing.

dbzkeebL.title: Ionic Cross-Linking Chitosan/Alginate Biodegradable Composite Film
dbzkeebL.abstract: A biodegradable composite film was made from chitosan and alginate,cross-linked by 10% sodium citrate and 3% calcium chloride solution.Effects of cross-linking time and pH on the mechanical properties and water resistance of the composite film were investigated.Besides,X-ray diffraction(XRD) and differential seanning calorinetry(DSC) were applied to characterize and analyze the thermal stability of the film.The results showed that the thickness of the composite film(24.2 μm) was less than the sum of thickness of chitosan film and alginate film(39 μm).This result indicated that chitosan and alginate partially mixed at the interface and might interact with each other during the film preparation.XRD and DSC showed that sodium citrate and calcium chloride cross-linked chitosan and alginate respectively,and the cross-linking decreased crystalline and improved thermal stability of the composite film.The best properties of the composite film could be achieved under a cross-linking time of 30 min and pH 7.0,with the highest tensile strength(120 MPa),while lowest water solubility(only 8.25%).The composite film overcame the drawbacks of single chitosan and alginate film,such as low mechanical properties and poor water resistance.The composite film was expected to replace low-density polyethylene,as a new food preservation packaging film.

XDevRljR.title: The use of resins made by complexes of chitosan and metals to clarify beer
XDevRljR.abstract: The resins made from complexes of chitosan and metal(RCCM)prepared by opposite crosslinking method were applied in the beer clarification.The effects of RCCM on beer quality were determined and compared with the finished product beer.The results indicated that the sensitive polyphenols were nearly all adsorbed,the turbidity decreased 97.10%,and the sensitive proteins decreased 48.6%.Meanwhile,the inorganic ions,the flavor compounds,the saccharides and the organic acids had no obvious changes.The amino acids increased 9.84%.Thus the resins made from complexes of chitosan and metal can be used as a new beer clarifier.

8pXUDSOe.title: Effect of pH and heating time on volatile products of Maillard reaction
8pXUDSOe.abstract: To study the effect of pH and heating time on volatile products of Maillard reaction,glucose-lysine model systems were employed.The results showed the pH of the systems played a crucial role on Maillard reaction,and effect of heating time on volatile products formed in Maillard reaction model systems was universal formula.It was expected to provide theory reference and technical support for optimization of processing technology of food.

R70Z5Zjh.title: Research progress on salt-tolerant Zygosaccharomyces rouxii
R70Z5Zjh.abstract: Zygosaccharomyces rouxii is one of the aroma-producing yeast st rains in soy sauce brewing. This paper reviewed the characteristics, salt-tolerant mechanism, trend of change, and major fuction of Zygosaccharomyces rouxii in soy sauce brewing. It also pointed out the existing problems of using Zygosaccharomyces rouxii in the industrial production of soy sauce, and proposed that the microbial breeding technology and cell stabilization technology were the future research area to improve the aroma-producing function of the yeast.

aoiVFBqf.title: Patulin biodegradation by marine yeast Kodameae ohmeri.
aoiVFBqf.abstract: Patulin contamination of fruit- and vegetable-based products had become a major challenge for the food industry. Biological methods of patulin control can play an important role due to their safety and high efficiency. In this study, a strain of marine yeast with high patulin degradation ability was screened. The yeast was identified as Kodameae ohmeri by the BioLog identification system and partial 26S rRNA gene sequencing. The degradation products of patulin were identified as (E)- and (Z)-ascladiol through HPLC and LC-TOF/MS. High patulin tolerance at 100 μg ml(-1) and a high degradation rate at 35°C at a pH between 3 and 6 indicates the potential application of K. ohmeri for patulin detoxification of apple-derived products.

RxxuJmNA.title: Halomonas shantousis sp. nov., a novel biogenic amines degrading bacterium isolated from Chinese fermented fish sauce.
RxxuJmNA.abstract: A Gram-negative, aerobic, short rod-shaped and non-motile bacterium, designated SWA25(T), was isolated from Chinese fermented fish sauce in Shantou, Guangdong Province, China. Strain SWA25(T) was moderately halophilic, formed colourless colonies and grew at 10-45 °C (optimum, 37 °C) and pH 4-9 (optimum, 6-7) in the presence of 0.5-22.5 % (w/v) NaCl (optimum, 3 %). The major cellular fatty acids (&gt;10 %) were identified as C18:1 ω7C, C16:0, C16:1 ω7c, and C19:0 cyclo ω8c, and the predominant respiratory ubiquinone was Q-9. The genomic DNA G+C content was 61.3 ± 2.1 mol %. Phylogenetic analysis based on 16S rRNA gene sequences indicated that strain SWA25(T) belonged to the genus Halomonas in the family Halomonadaceae. The closest relatives were Halomonas xianhensis A-1(T) (96.5 % 16S rRNA gene sequence similarity), H. lutea DSM 23508(T) (96.5 %) and H. muralis LMG 20969(T) (96.1 %). DNA-DNA hybridization assays showed 30.7 ± 2.6 % relatedness between strain SWA25(T) and H. xianhensis A-1(T), and 39.4 ± 4.1 % between strain SWA25(T) and H. lutea DSM 23508(T). On the basis of phenotypic, chemotaxonomic and phylogenetic features, strain SWA25(T) should be placed in the genus Halomonas as a representative of a novel species. The name Halomonas shantousis sp. nov. is proposed, with SWA25(T)(=CCTCC AB 2013151(T) = JCM 19368(T)) as the type strain.

klYSnXNy.title: Preparation of mixed rare earths modified chitosan for fluoride adsorption
klYSnXNy.abstract: This paper described the fluoride removal from water using a new adsorbent namely mixed rare earths modified chitosan (CR). Mixed rare earths mainly contained La followed by Ce which was analyzed by inductively coupled plasma mass spectrometry (ICP-MS). La(III)-modified chitosan (CL) was also prepared as control. For the batch technique, the effects of various parameters such as contact time, pH, adsorbent dose, initial fluoride concentration and co-ions on fluoride adsorption were studied. Fourier transform infrared spectroscopy (FTIR) and X-ray diffraction (XRD) were used to characterize adsorbents. It was observed that the fluoride adsorption capacity of CR (3.72 mgF-/g) was higher than CL (3.16 mgF-/g) at 2 h. The presence of co-ions such as bicarbonate and carbonate greatly affected the fluoride adsorption from water. Characterization experiments indicated the successful chelation between mixed rare earths and chitosan. The possible fluoride adsorption mechanism of CR was explained by a chemical reaction. © 2013 The Chinese Society of Rare Earths.

TrV3Ebx9.title: Synergistic-protective Effects of Tea polysaccharides and Tea polyphenols on Diabetes
TrV3Ebx9.abstract: Diabetes mellitus is a disorder of metabolism,which has been a serious threat to people's health.In recent years,studies have shown that tea polysaccharides and tea polyphenols could effectively prevent and treat diabetes and its complications.However,reports at present have mainly concentrated in the tea polysaccharides and tea polyphenols alone in the treatment of diabetes and its complications,few have reported their synergistic treatment to diabetes and its complications.In this paper,tea polysaccharides and tea polyphenols alone and their synergistic effect on the prevention of diabetes has been related.The study of synergistic-protective effect of green tea polysaccharides and tea polyphenols on Sprague Dawley diabetic rats proved the synergistic preventive effect of tea polyphenols and tea polysaccharides.

43ONC3I0.title: Purification and characterization of a polysaccharide in malt inducing premature yeast flocculation
43ONC3I0.abstract: Premature yeast flocculation(PYF)in beer brewing due to the presence of a malt polysaccharide.A polysaccharide which named PYFⅠ-Ⅰ and its molecular weight was more than 10000 Da.was purified after sedimented by ethanol,remove of protein,ultrafiltration,Chromatography by DEAE-Sephadex A-25 and Sephadex G-100.The polysaccharide accelerated the flocculation of yeast apparently.The polysaccharide was identified as a protein containing polysaccharide by experiment,the content of polysaccharides and proteins was 58.3% and 3.8%.The discovery of the polysaccharide will do good to the further study of PYF in beer brewing.

9CqomnKO.title: Biosorption of Cu~(2+) from aqueous solution by salt-tolerant yeast Zygosaccharomyces rouxii CICC1379
9CqomnKO.abstract: We studied the biosorption process and mechanism of Cu2+ from aqueous solution onto lyophilized biomass of salt-tolerant Zygosaccharomyces rouxii CICC1379. The effects of temperature,initial pH and contact time on the rate of removal of Cu2+ from aqueous solution were measured in a batch system. The biosorption kinetics and isotherm models were also studied. The results showed that temperature (25~40℃) had an insignificant effect on Cu2+ biosorption onto the biomass,while initial pH affected the Cu2+ removal rate significantly. The optimum initial pH for the biosorption was 4~6 and decreased as the pH dropped to 2. During the treatment process,the pH of the solution changed from an initial pH range of 4.00 to 6.99 to the natural pH of CuCl2 with the same concentration. The 89.2% of its maximum Cu2+ biosorption capability was achieved during the first 5 min and the Cu2+ biosorption equilibrium was attained within 30 min. The kinetics data fit well with the pseudo-second-order equation. The Freundlich isotherm model described the experimental data of the biosorption of Cu2+ onto Z. rouxii CICC1379 biomass perfectly,followed by the Langmuir isotherm model.

b9ednEbn.title: Study on preparation and properties of tannins immobilized chitosan-Ce 4+ resins
b9ednEbn.abstract: The tannins immobilized chitosan-Ce4+ resins (TCCR) were prepared. The optimum conditions on activating and coupling of chitosan resins were obtained by means of orthogonal design experiments. TCCR were characterized by DSC and FT-IR. The adsorption capacity for bovine serum albumin (BSA) of TCCR was investigated. The results show that TCCR have an excellent adsorption capacity for BSA in water, comparing with chitosan-Ce4+ resins (CCR). The TCCR can be a novel functional material for removal protein in some beverages. © 2010 The Chinese Society of Rare Earths.

Xygpy5ie.title: Effect of Green Tea on Diabetes
Xygpy5ie.abstract: Diabetes mellitus is a disorder of metabolism and associated with long-term complications that affect eyes,heart,blood vessel,and kidney function.Though oral hypoglycemic agents and insulin are the main prevention and therapy treatment of diabetes,but they have severe side effects and fail to significantly alter the course of diabetic complications.As one of the most popular beverages consumed worldwide,green tea is being widely studied for its health benefits in recent years.In vitro and in vivo studies provide strong evidence that green tea presents a great prophylactic and therapeutic effect against diabetes.This review summarizes the beneficial effects of green tea on diabetes prevention and treatment.

BFzuesYg.title: Improvement of protein stability of white wine by chitosan-bentonite resin
BFzuesYg.abstract: A recyclable chitosan-bentonite resin(CBR) was prepared using chitosan and bentonite as raw materials.Experiments were performed to investigate the effect of the resin on the stability of protein in white wines.The results showed that CBR was stable in alcohol-water solutions,which was suitable for clarifying and stabilizing white wines.White wine was stable after 1.00g CBR was added into 100ml wine with interval stirring for 36h at 15℃.CBR could also enhance the stability of protein in wine after being reused for 3 times and regenerated.The total proteins and the total polyphenols content in white wines treated with CBR decreased by around 34% and 30%,respectively,meanwhile,no significant effect on the content of total sugar,reducing sugar,alcoholic degree and pH of wine was detected.Experiments could provide feasible references for CBR in the application of white wines.

upg3azoX.title: Removal of cadmium from Chlamys ferrari skirt border enzymatic hydrolysate by cross-linked chitosan resins
upg3azoX.abstract: In this paper,chitosan was used as raw material for preparing the five kinds of cross-linked chitosan resins,chitosan resin(CTS),chitosan bound Ce resin(CTS-Ce),chitosan-tea polysaccharide bound Ce resin(CTS-TPS-Ce),chitosan-tea polysaccharide resin(CTS-TPS)and chitosan bound Zn resin(CTS-Zn).The effects of the different kinds of chitosan resins on the removal of Cd from Chlamys ferrari skirt border enzymatic hydrolysate were studied and their effects on the beneficial ingredients such as proteins,amino acids and trace elements(Zn,Fe,Ca and Mg) were analyzed.The results indicated that CTS-Zn was useful for the removal of Cd from Chlamys ferrari skirt border hydrolysate and the removal rate was more than 80%.In contrast,the adsorption effects of CTS-Zn on proteins,amino acids and the trace elements were less than that on Cd.

Ac4RwLr8.title: Effects of chitosan-RE~(3+)-bentonite on growth of Chlorella vulgaris
Ac4RwLr8.abstract: Bentonite was modified with chitosan and REIs(La3+,Ce3+) to form chitosan-RE3+-bentonite(CRB) . CRB were characterized by DSC and FT-IR. And the inhibitory effects of CRB on the growth of Chlorella vulgaris were investigated. The results indicated that CRB could inhibit the growth of Chlorella vulgaris. The relative conductivity and the generation of malondialdehyde(MDA) increased. In addition,the superoxide dismutase(SOD) and peroxidase(POD) activities decreased. So CRB could be a promising algaecide agent.

AkdlCXb5.title: Effect of NaCl Sress Cultivation on Zygosaccharomyces rouxii Biosorption to Cadmium
AkdlCXb5.abstract: Cadmium in aqueous solution can be absorbed by the salt-tolerant yeast Zygosaccharomyces rouxii CICC1379.Effect of Z.rouxii CICC1379 from the YEPD medium without or with different content NaCl on the biomass and cadmium removal rate were evaluated respectively.The results are shown as follows:with the NaCl concentration increased,the biomass of the yeast decreased,however,the cadmium removal rate increased.In every of the pH 2~7 of cadmium solution,cadmium removal rate by the yeast from the 150 g/L NaCl stress cultivation were obviously higher than that from the normal(P<0.001).The pH of cadmium solution was changed after the biosorption.The pH inclined to the natural pH of cadmium solution treated by the biosorption during pH 4.00-6.99.The size of the individual yeast from the 150 g/L NaCl stress cultivation was smaller and less scab than that from the normal cultivation as visualized by SEM.

CCwHKAzM.title: PREPARATION AND CHARACTERIZATION THE RARE EARTH MODIFIED CHITOSAN RESIN ABSORBENT AND ITS DEFLUORIDATION PERFORMANCE
CCwHKAzM.abstract: Defluoridation absorbent was prepared by rare earth compounds modified chitosan via inverse suspension method.Then the effect of various parameters,such as contact time,pH,absorbent dosage,initial fluoride concentration and co-ions,on fluoride adsorption were performed.It was observed that fluoride adsorption capacity was 1.83 mg/g when contact time was 2 h,and the adsorption capacity was decreased significantly with increasing pH from 5.0～9.0.It was found that fluoride absorbent dosage affected the fluoride adsorption rate greatly as the same as the initial fluoride concentration did.Adsorption rate was increased with the increase of defluoridation absorbent dosage from 0.5～5.0 g/L and initial fluoride concentration from 1.25～20 mg/L.Carbonate and hydrogen carbonate ions could reduce fluoride adsorption capacity evidently.Finally,FITR and SEM results confirmed that a novel fluoride absorbent was successfully prepared in this work.

wLcP6vkL.title: Research on accumulation of inorganic selenium in pacific oyster(Crassostrea gigas)
wLcP6vkL.abstract: Accumulations of selenium in pacific oyster cultured in seawater were achieved by adding selenite(Na2SeO3).Biotransformation and distribution of selenium in the oyster was investigated through measuring the selenium of biological samples and different positions.The results showed that the total selenium content in oyster(fresh weight) is(0.638±0.079) μg/g before accumulation.After exposed in seawater containing 15 μg/mL Na2SeO3for 3 days,the concentration of total selenium is(4.049±0.340) μg/g while the organic selenium(3.159±0.229) μg/g and the inorganic selenium(0.890±0.082) μg/g.The result shows that selenium is predominately present as organic selenium.The concentrations of selenium in different positions ascend in 3 days.And the increase of organic selenium is observably more than inorganic selenium.This implies that pacific oyster could effectively accumulate selenium and transform inorganic selenium into organic selenium by metabolism.

7RmrRaP7.title: Study on effect of papin hydrolysis and TGase cross-linking on emulsifying properties of soy protein isolate
7RmrRaP7.abstract: The effect of papain hydrolysis and TGase cross-linking on emulsifying properties of soy protein isolate(SPI) was investigated. The effect of the cross-linking with samples on different degrees of hydrolysis on the particle size distribution,the mean diameter per particle surface area and the centrifugal creaming rate of the emulsions were analyzed. The effect of different store conditions,such as room temperature storage,cold storage and freeze storage,on the flocculation stability and coalescence stability of samples were also studied. The result showed that:in the range of degree of hydrolysis(DH 2%~10%),the emulsifying activity of papain hydrolyzed SPI improved with the increase of DH. TGase cross-linking improved the emulsifying stability effectively,especially the cross-linked hydrolyzed SPI with lower DH. The optimum emulsifying stability was obtained when cross-linked the hydrolyzed SPI in DH 10%. During room temperature,the flocculation stability could improve effectively by TGase cross-linking of papain hydrolyzed SPI(DH 6%~10%). Freeze-thaw process would decrease the coalescence stability of emulsion stabilized with SPI,and the emulsions stabilized with cross-linking of the hydrolyzed SPI(DH 6%~10%) could improve the coalescence stability. Thus,these modified samples could be used in some frozen food.

pAFHWIM3.title: Optimization of medium for biosorbent salt-torlerance Zygosaccharomyces rouxii
pAFHWIM3.abstract: Biomass of salt-tolerance Zygosaccharomyces rouxii can be used as biosorbent of heavy metal ions in polluted water.In order to obtain more biomass,medium for Z.rouxii CICC1379 was optimized with central composite design and response surface analysis method.Results of single factor experiments indicated that the best carbon sources were glucose and maltose and the best nitrogen source was yeast extract.The results of two-factor factorial design indicated that contents of glucose,maltose,and yeast extract significantly affected yield of biomass,and content of MgSO4,NaCl,KH2PO4 and CaCl2 had no significant effect.The optimum medium was obtained with central composite design and response surface analysis method as follows: glucose 5.0%,maltose 3.3%,yeast extract 2.8%,MgSO4 0.3% and NaCl 0.6%.The maximum yield of biomass was predicted to be 10.13 mg/mL with model of quadratic regression.It was validated by the yeast biomass with 10.11mg/mL from the optimized medium in shaking flasks,which verified the effectiveness of the model.Yield of biomass with the optimum medium was increased by 44.0%,82.8% and 102.6% to wort medium,YEPD and YM,respectively.This optimization medium increased potentiality of applications of Z.rouxii CICC1379 as the biosorbent.

uf5dLT6j.title: Research advances in hydrolytic action of metal ion complexes
uf5dLT6j.abstract: The hydrolytic action of metal ion complexes has become increasingly important in recent years.Comparing to the hydrolytic action of enzymes and chemical regeants,metal ion complexs easily hydrolyse substrates in mild pathways and consume less resources.The hydrolytic actions of metal complexes prepared from cyclodextrin,heterocyclic compound,polysaccharides and polymeric scaffold were reviewed,focusing on the current advances of their hydrolysis capabilities towards peptide and phosphate bond.

nQ2l3AE9.title: Study on preparation of chitosan and gellan gum biodegradable composite film by ionic cross-linking
nQ2l3AE9.abstract: A biodegradable composite film without water solubility was made from chitosan and gellan,glycerin as plasticizers,cross-linked by 4% sodium citrate and 2% calcium chloride. Effect of cross-linking time and pH on the mechanical properties and water resistance of composite film were investigated. Besides,infrared spectrum(FT-IR),X-ray diffraction(X-RD),scanning electron microscopy(SEM)and differential scanning calorimetry(DSC)were used to characterize and analyze the structure and thermal stability of the film. The results showed that sodium citrate and calcium chloride cross-linked composite film,and the cross-linking decreased the crystallinity of chitosan and gellan,and then improved thermal stability of composite film. The composite film had the best properties under a cross-linking time of 5min and pH6. 0,tensile strength 91. 45MPa,water solubility 7. 28%,swelling ratio 416. 63%,water vapor permeability 0. 68×10-10g/(Pa·s·m2),compounding and ion crosslinking improved mechanical properties and water resistance of single film.

mDG2Wvz2.title: 3x3 Coupler Based Mach-Zehnder Interferometer and its Application in the Delamination Detection in Composite

gf0Mn5az.title: Application of 3??3 coupler based Mach-Zehnder interferometer in delamination patch detection in composite
gf0Mn5az.abstract: Interferometric type fiber-optic sensors have advantages of high sensitivity and can be employed to measure very small measurand. In this paper, a 3 x 3 coupler based demodulation using software approach is introduced and its advantages are presented. Based on this technique, mechanical tests are performed and the sensing arm of the interferometer is embedded along the neutral plane of the laminate. A quasi-impulse loading is applied and the total elongation of the embedded optical fiber is measured as a function of load position. When a delamination is present, the shift of neutral axis position can be clearly reflected in the fiber integral strain versus load position plot. Experimental results demonstrate the feasibility of detecting both the size and location of delamination patch with the proposed technique. (C) 2011 Elsevier Ltd. All rights reserved.

lZecHlmW.title: An Industrialized Multi-Layer Precast Concrete Frame Building with Middle-Joint Beams and Columns
lZecHlmW.abstract: An industrialized multi-layer precast concrete building with middle-joint beams and columns frame system has been developed by China VANKE CO., LTD. The building is the first industrialized multi-layer precast concrete building for experimental purpose in China. A middle-joint beams and columns method has been utilized with beams and columns split in the middle place. The whole frame structure is then integrated into a unity through precast beams, precast columns, and reliable cast-in-place column-column and beam-beam joints. This paper presents the key points and difficulties during the building design process, introduces the structural design of column-column and beam-beam joints, and analyses the advantages and weaknesses of middle-joint beams and columns frame system.

IdGa7LSU.title: Numerical study on delamination detection in Ⅰ-section GFRP beam with optical fiber-based ultrasonic technique
IdGa7LSU.abstract: In order to overcome the effects of FRP multi-interface,high damping characteristics and diversity of the body wave mode on the ultrasonic nondestructive test,a novel technique for detecting delamination is proposed.A PZT transmitter was employed to create the stress waves in the beam,and an optical fiber interferometric sensor was attached to the surface of the beam to detect the stress wave propagation in the beam.By analyzing the propagation characteristics of ultrasound and the wavelet time-frequency spectrum of the signal,the delamination location can be identified.Based on the theoretical analysis and simulation results,the feasibility of delamination detection with the proposed technique is demonstrated.

kP2zORq7.title: Computational study on delamination detection in FRP beam with an ultrasonic-optic technique
kP2zORq7.abstract: A novel technique for detecting delamination based on ultrasonic non-destructive technique is proposed. A PZT transmitter was employed to create the stress waves in the beam, and an optical fiber interferometric sensor was attached to the surface of the beam to detect the stress wave propagation in the beam. By analyzing the propagation characteristics of ultrasound and the wavelet timefrequency spectrum of the signal, the delamination location can be identified. Based on the theoretical analysis and simulation results, the feasibility of delamination detection with the proposed technique is demonstrated. © 2016 Taylor & Francis Group, London.

uRugyq6A.title: Investigation on early hydration features of magnesium potassium phosphate cementitious material with the electrodeless resistivity method
uRugyq6A.abstract: An electrodeless resistivity method is applied to trace the early hydration behavior of magnesium potassium phosphate cement (MKPC). The relationship between setting times (including initial and final setting time) and the characteristic points of the electrodeless resistance is studied, aiming to establish a rapid testing method which could predict the setting time of MKPC. Moreover, a linear relationship between the standard compressive strength at 28 days and the resistivity at 24 h of MKPC is also established, and demonstrates that the resistivity and the standard compressive strength have a compact corresponding relationship. Therefore, the standard compressive strength of magnesium potassium phosphate cement could be predicted by electrodeless resistivity parameters. © 2018 Elsevier Ltd
